name: Hidden Dream (Rustdiamond_games)
description:
“Hidden  Dream” is a game about puzzle, exploration and collection. In this game, players are supposed to participate in the story that how the Princess Wencheng complete her journey to Tibet for getting married with Srongtsen Gampo in the Princess Wencheng’s fantasy world.

 

There will be plenty puzzle and a lot of collecting elements in this game. The collections include Chinese traditional culture of history. The daily life, the local conditions and customs, the natural scenery of China during the Tang Dynasty.

 

Players will experience diverting playing method and mental adventure relevant to Chinese traditional culture in this wonderful journey.

 

“Hidden Dream” is a journey that full of mysteries and loneliness, but without any danger. Players will play the role of Princess Wencheng and experience her gradual change in her adventure.

 

Players will explore a new world by learning a variety of skills step by step. Meanwhile, will figure out Princess Wencheng‘s puzzles. Players will grow with Princess Wencheng together while proceed along this journey.

 

Players also will hear original music of Chinese customs, experience visual impact of Chinese historical and cultural scenes that appeared by exquisite painting style, enjoy the fun of solving puzzles, feel attractive Chinese traditional history and culture through this fantastic story.
